img.alt: Buttonwillow Union School District Current Agenda

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h2: Welcome to buttonwillow union school district Home of the Roadrunners

div.p: A look back to Friday's food distribution from @CAP_Kern and the @CAPKFoodBank. Thank you to our school staff volunteers who served enough food to cover over 1000 meals. It is about the hands, heart, and mind in BW. #1townschoolcommunity @SmallSchoolDA @caedpartners

Learning continues in Preschool! No Chromebooks like K-8, but we deliver materials so students can learn through play. They even have small @zoom_us and @ClassDojo share meetings with teachers. Our preschool team is doing great. @SmallSchoolDA @caedpartners #1townschoolcommunity
Here is the last of 3 messages that were created for our students by all of the staff at Buttonwillow. We miss our Roadrunners. #1townschoolcommunity @SmallschoolDA

Today our @caedpartners Math & Language Arts teams had a professional conversation regarding student progress, social emotional learning, equity, performance, and effort. Our team developed the expectations for the rest of the school year. @SmallSchoolDA #1townschoolcommunity

h3.a: BW Providing On-Line Learning for the Rest of Year

div.p:
Dear Parents and Guardians,
Yesterday afternoon Governor Newsom made the recommendation to close schools for the remainder of the year. After consultation with the Kern County......
Buttonwillow School PresentsChromebook Check OutWhen: Saturday, March 28th in the Buttonwillow School Gym Who: Parents and students may come to the school at the time listed below for any grade......
This is to inform you that the school closure has been extended at Buttonwillow School as well as all school districts in Kern County. The extension remains fluid and is tentatively scheduled......
